author: stefan2
msg: Replace local block size constants from the FSFS stats code and use
(read_item): Use the block size provided by the REV_FILE object.
(read_log_rev_or_packfile): Take the block size from the FS settings.

author: stefan2
msg: Remove a couple of unused fields from the FSFS stats internal data model.

author: stefan2
msg: Replace the stats code's local directory parser and underlying windows
caching and undeltifying code with the FSFS standard dir access mechanism.
(query_t): We don't need our local window cache anymore.
get_combined_window): Drop these window handling functions.
(parse_dir): Take a proper noderev to select the directory to process
and use the FSFS standard function to read the directory.
(create_query): Remove init code for the defunct local cache.

author: stefan2
msg: Use the FSFS standard parsers for noderevs and representation headers
within the stats code instead of its own (albeit faster) ones.
(parse_representation): Expect a FSFS representation_t to be passed
in already sparing us the parsing here.
Replace the call to former read_rep_base
(read_noderev): Replace the local parsing logic with a call to the
FSFS noderev parser. Update variable usage.
